backup.sembot: No bots found. Use **.up** to upload.
backup.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to backup.
backup.iddiferente: The provided ID is not the same as any of your bots.
backup.dmFechado: Your DM is locked, release to be able to use the command.

bots.semBots: This member has not hosted any bots.
bots.dmblock: An error occurred, make sure your direct messages are not blocked on the server.

cleardm.erro: An error occurred while opening your direct messages.
cleardm.semmsg: There are no message logs sent by the bot on your DM.

msgFinal.part2: messages sent by the bot in your DM have been deleted.

cleardm.errofinal: An error occurred while trying to delete the messages.

commit.semregistro: You need to register on our site <http://discloudbot.com> before hosting your bot.
commit.sembots: No bots found. Use **.up** to upload.
commit.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to commit.
commit.idinvalido: The provided ID is not the same as any of your bots.
commit.botparado: Your bot is stopped, if you want to start it use:
commit.canalduplo: You already have an open thread to commit or upload your bot, wait until the channel closes to use this command again.

thread.envie: Send the file you want to commit.
thread.arquivoerro: There is something wrong with your instance, remove your bot and resubmit using the commands
thread.formato: The format **.rar** is not supported, use the extension **.zip**
thread.baixandomsgerror: An error occurred while downloading the file you sent, make sure the file is not corrupted and try again.
thread.amienteerror1: An error occurred while setting up the environment.
thread.amienteerror2: Ask a team member to check for more information about the error in the console.
thread.packerro1: We have identified an error in your file
thread.ficheiros: Your bot files have been updated successfully.
thread.time: You took too long to send the attachment or link of your bot's file.

delete.semregistro: you need to register on our website <http://discloudbot.com>.
delete.sembots: you haven't uploaded any bot yet, use `.up` to upload.
delete.semid: type the ID of the bot you want to delete a file or folder.
delete.idinvalido: the given ID is not the same as any of your bots.
delete.semcaminho: type the path of the file or folder you want to delete from the bot directory.
delete.principal: you cannot delete your bot's main file.
delete.invalidFolder: you cannot delete the {{folder}} folder from your bot directory.
delete.invalidFile: you cannot delete the {{file}} file from your bot directory.
delete.invalidDirectory:
invalid path.
If you want to delete a folder, put `/` at the end of the path and if it is a file, put the extension.
delete.verifyFolder: do you really want to delete the folder `{{folder}}` and its {{num}} files/folders inside?
delete.verifyFile: do you really want to delete the {{file}} file permanently from your bot directory?
delete.timeOut: you took too long to respond and the action was canceled.
delete.unknowError: an error occurred while deleting the file/folder, contact support.

dir.sembot: You have not yet uploaded any bots use **up** to level up
dir.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to see in the directory.
dir.iddiferente: The ID you entered is not the same as any of your bots.
dir.zeroinstancia: You did not create an instance for your bot, use the  **.up** command, and follow the instructions.

embed.setAuthor: Listing of all folders/files on your bot:

dir.dmblock: An error occurred, make sure your direct messages are not blocked on the server.

iniciar.sembot: You do not have any bots hosted on DisCloud.
iniciar.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to start.
iniciar.iddiferente: The ID you entered is not the same as any of your bots.
iniciar.duploip: You already have an account registered with our system, please contact support to resolve your issue.
iniciar.limitefree: We're processing a lot of free plan bots right now, try again later, or buy one of our plans and host your bot now with no limits.
iniciar.error: There is something wrong with your instance, remove your bot and send again using the commands:
iniciar.iniciarerro: There was an error starting your bot.

parar.sembot: You don't have any bot hosted on DisCloud.
parar.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to stop.
parar.iddiferente: The provided ID is not the same as any of your bots.
parar.erro: There was an error stopping your bot.
parar.sucesso: Your bot has been successfully stopped.

reiniciar.sembot: You do not have any bots hosted on DisCloud.
reiniciar.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to restart.
reiniciar.iddiferente: The provided ID is not the same as any of your bots.
reiniciar.parado: Your bot is stopped, if you want to start it use

reiniciar.sucesso: Your bot has been successfully restarted.

removerbot.sembot: You do not have any bots hosted on DisCloud.
removerbot.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to remove.
removerbot.iddiferente: The provided ID is not the same as any of your bots.
removerbot.sucesso: Your bot has been successfully removed.

resetweek.sfree: only members with the free plan can reset the bots timer.
resetweek.sucesso: your bot timer was successfully reset to
resetweek.error: there was an error resetting your bot's timer.

status.sembot: No bots found. Use **.up** to upload.
status.semid: Enter the ID of the bot you want to see statistics for or `all` to see them all.
status.iddiferente: The provided ID is not the same as any of your bots.
status.killRam: your Bot crashed due to lack of RAM.

terminal.sembot: No bots found. Use **.up** to upload.
terminal.semid: Enter the ID of the bot that wants to see the logs.
terminal.iddiferente: The provided ID is not the same as any of your bots.

embedDiscord.setDescription:
React with {{file}} to see the last 2000 characters of the terminal here.
React with {{enviar}} to send the complete logs to your DM.
embedDiscord.setFooter: Last 2000 characters of the {{tag}} bot terminal
embedDiscord.sendDM: complete bot logs were sent to your DM.
embedDiscord.dmBlock: your DM is blocked, release to be able to receive the logs.

embedDM.setDescription: Click here to see the complete terminal
